official_title: A resolution authorizing the President to proclaim the month of November 1978 as "National REACT Month".

summary.text: Authorizes and requests the President to designate the month of November, 1978, as "National REACT Month" (radio emergency associated citizens teams).

titles.title: A resolution authorizing the President to proclaim the month of November 1978 as "National REACT Month".
